entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Penticton Airport 6:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 84 %
Dewpoint: 0.0°C
Wind: S 19 km/h

entry.title: Monday night: Snow mixed with rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening. Snow mixed with rain beginning this evening. Snow level 600 metres lowering to valley bottom this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Rain at times mixed with snow early in the morning. Snow level rising to 700 metres in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Snow level 700 metres. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light in the evening. Low plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
